diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..025cd4749e009338c7542f0a1d7a1ab6e93b47f7
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
+- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
+- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
+- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
+- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
+- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
+- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
+- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
+- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Client cleanup and configs
+- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
+- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Build plugin configuration
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
+- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
+- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
+- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
+- Suggested Actions:
+  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
+  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
+  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).

-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
-import org.springframework.core.ParameterizedTypeReference;

-import org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate;
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpDelete;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpGet;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpPost;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpClient;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.HttpClients;
+import org.apache.hc.core5.http.io.entity.StringEntity;
+import java.io.BufferedReader;
+import java.io.InputStreamReader;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
 import java.util.List;
 
-@Component
+@ApplicationScoped
 public class CartClient {
 
-    private final String baseUrl;
-
-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {
-        this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
-    }
-
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+    @ConfigProperty(name = "app.cart.url")
+    String baseUrl;
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        try (CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault()) {
+            HttpPost init = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" +
+                    encode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123");
+            client.execute(init).close();
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Infinite Jest"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Bel Canto"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Kafka on the Shore"))).close();
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            var response = client.execute(get);
+            List<String> books = new ArrayList<>();
+            try (var entity = response.getEntity();
+                 var in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(entity.getContent()))) {
+                String line;
+                while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
+                    books.add(line);
+                }
+            }
+            books.forEach(title -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            client.execute(new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + encode("Gravity's Rainbow"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear")).close();
+        }
     }
 
+    private String encode(String s) {
+        return s.replace(" ", "%20").replace("'", "%27");
+    }
 }

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..025cd4749e009338c7542f0a1d7a1ab6e93b47f7
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
+- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
+- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
+- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
+- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
+- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
+- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
+- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
+- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Client cleanup and configs
+- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
+- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Build plugin configuration
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
+- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
+- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
+- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
+- Suggested Actions:
+  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
+  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
+  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).

+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
 
-@SpringBootApplication
-public class Application implements CommandLineRunner {
+@QuarkusMain
+public class Application implements QuarkusApplication {
 
-    private final CartClient cartClient;
-
-    public Application(CartClient cartClient) {
-        this.cartClient = cartClient;
-    }
+    @Inject
+    CartClient cartClient;
 
     public static void main(String[] args) {
-        SpringApplication.run(Application.class, args);
+        Quarkus.run(Application.class, args);
     }
 
     @Override
-    public void run(String... args) throws Exception {
+    public int run(String... args) throws Exception {
         try {
             cartClient.doCartOperations();
         } catch (Exception ex) {
             System.err.println("Caught a BookException: " + ex.getMessage());
         }
+        return 0;
     }

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
-import org.springframework.core.ParameterizedTypeReference;
-import org.springframework.http.HttpMethod;
-import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
-import org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate;
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpDelete;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpGet;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpPost;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpClient;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.HttpClients;
+import org.apache.hc.core5.http.io.entity.StringEntity;
+import java.io.BufferedReader;
+import java.io.InputStreamReader;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
 import java.util.List;
 
-@Component
+@ApplicationScoped
 public class CartClient {
 
-    private final String baseUrl;
-
-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {
-        this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
-    }
-
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+    @ConfigProperty(name = "app.cart.url")
+    String baseUrl;
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        try (CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault()) {
+            HttpPost init = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" +
+                    encode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123");
+            client.execute(init).close();
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Infinite Jest"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Bel Canto"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Kafka on the Shore"))).close();
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            var response = client.execute(get);
+            List<String> books = new ArrayList<>();
+            try (var entity = response.getEntity();
+                 var in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(entity.getContent()))) {
+                String line;
+                while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
+                    books.add(line);
+                }
+            }
+            books.forEach(title -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            client.execute(new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + encode("Gravity's Rainbow"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear")).close();
+        }
     }
 
+    private String encode(String s) {
+        return s.replace(" ", "%20").replace("'", "%27");
+    }
 }

bash -lc "sed -n '1,240p' CHANGELOG.md" in /home/bmcginn/git/final_conversions/conversions/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1 succeeded in 256ms:
# Migration Changelog

## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.

## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.

## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.

## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
file update:
diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md

index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..025cd4749e009338c7542f0a1d7a1ab6e93b47f7
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
+- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
+- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
+- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
+- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
+- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
+- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
+- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
+- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Client cleanup and configs
+- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
+- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Build plugin configuration
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
+- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
+- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
+- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
+- Suggested Actions:
+  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
+  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
+  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.boot.CommandLineRunner;
-import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication;
-import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication;
+import io.quarkus.runtime.QuarkusApplication;
+import io.quarkus.runtime.annotations.QuarkusMain;
+import io.quarkus.runtime.Quarkus;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
 
-@SpringBootApplication
-public class Application implements CommandLineRunner {
+@QuarkusMain
+public class Application implements QuarkusApplication {
 
-    private final CartClient cartClient;
-
-    public Application(CartClient cartClient) {
-        this.cartClient = cartClient;
-    }
+    @Inject
+    CartClient cartClient;
 
     public static void main(String[] args) {
-        SpringApplication.run(Application.class, args);
+        Quarkus.run(Application.class, args);
     }
 
     @Override
-    public void run(String... args) throws Exception {
+    public int run(String... args) throws Exception {
         try {
             cartClient.doCartOperations();
         } catch (Exception ex) {
             System.err.println("Caught a BookException: " + ex.getMessage());
         }
+        return 0;
     }

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
-import org.springframework.core.ParameterizedTypeReference;
-import org.springframework.http.HttpMethod;
-import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
-import org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate;
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpDelete;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpGet;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpPost;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpClient;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.HttpClients;
+import org.apache.hc.core5.http.io.entity.StringEntity;
+import java.io.BufferedReader;
+import java.io.InputStreamReader;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
 import java.util.List;
 
-@Component
+@ApplicationScoped
 public class CartClient {
 
-    private final String baseUrl;
-
-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {
-        this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
-    }
-
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+    @ConfigProperty(name = "app.cart.url")
+    String baseUrl;
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        try (CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault()) {
+            HttpPost init = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" +
+                    encode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123");
+            client.execute(init).close();
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Infinite Jest"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Bel Canto"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Kafka on the Shore"))).close();
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            var response = client.execute(get);
+            List<String> books = new ArrayList<>();
+            try (var entity = response.getEntity();
+                 var in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(entity.getContent()))) {
+                String line;
+                while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
+                    books.add(line);
+                }
+            }
+            books.forEach(title -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            client.execute(new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + encode("Gravity's Rainbow"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear")).close();
+        }
     }
 
+    private String encode(String s) {
+        return s.replace(" ", "%20").replace("'", "%27");
+    }
 }

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..025cd4749e009338c7542f0a1d7a1ab6e93b47f7
--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
+- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
+- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
+- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
+- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
+- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
+- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
+- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
+- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Client cleanup and configs
+- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
+- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [info] Build plugin configuration
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.
+
+## [$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
+- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
+- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
+- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
+- Suggested Actions:
+  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
+  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
+  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).

-    public CartController(Cart cart) {

+    @Inject

-            @RequestParam(value = "id", required = false) String id)
-            throws BookException {
+    @POST
+    @Path("/initialize")
+    public void initialize(@QueryParam("person") String person,
+                           @QueryParam("id") String id) throws BookException {
         if (id == null) {
             cart.initialize(person);
         } else {
@@ -29,25 +29,28 @@
         }
     }
 
-    @PostMapping("/add")
-    public void addBook(@RequestParam("title") String title) {
+    @POST
+    @Path("/add")
+    public void addBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) {
         cart.addBook(title);
     }
 
-    @DeleteMapping("/remove")
-    public void removeBook(@RequestParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
+    @DELETE
+    @Path("/remove")
+    public void removeBook(@QueryParam("title") String title) throws BookException {
         cart.removeBook(title);
     }
 
-    @GetMapping("/contents")
+    @GET
+    @Path("/contents")
     public List<String> getContents() {
         return cart.getContents();
     }
 
-    @PostMapping("/clear")
-    public void checkout(HttpSession session) {
+    @POST
+    @Path("/clear")
+    public void checkout(@Context HttpServletRequest request) {

-        session.invalidate();
+        request.getSession().invalidate();

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
-import org.springframework.core.ParameterizedTypeReference;
-import org.springframework.http.HttpMethod;
-import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
-import org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate;
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpDelete;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpGet;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpPost;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpClient;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.HttpClients;
+import org.apache.hc.core5.http.io.entity.StringEntity;
+import java.io.BufferedReader;
+import java.io.InputStreamReader;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
 import java.util.List;
 
-@Component
+@ApplicationScoped
 public class CartClient {
 
-    private final String baseUrl;
-
-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {
-        this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
-    }
-
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+    @ConfigProperty(name = "app.cart.url")
+    String baseUrl;
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        try (CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault()) {
+            HttpPost init = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" +
+                    encode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123");
+            client.execute(init).close();
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Infinite Jest"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Bel Canto"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Kafka on the Shore"))).close();
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            var response = client.execute(get);
+            List<String> books = new ArrayList<>();
+            try (var entity = response.getEntity();
+                 var in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(entity.getContent()))) {
+                String line;
+                while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
+                    books.add(line);
+                }
+            }
+            books.forEach(title -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            client.execute(new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + encode("Gravity's Rainbow"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear")).close();
+        }
     }
 
+    private String encode(String s) {
+        return s.replace(" ", "%20").replace("'", "%27");
+    }
 }

diff --git a/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md

--- /dev/null
+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:41:00Z] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
+- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:41:30Z] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
+- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:42:30Z] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
+- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:43:15Z] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
+- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
+- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
+- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
+- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
+- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:43:45Z] [info] Client cleanup and configs
+- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
+- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:44:10Z] [info] Build plugin configuration
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:44:24Z] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
+- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
+- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
+- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
+- Suggested Actions:
+  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
+  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
+  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
-import org.springframework.core.ParameterizedTypeReference;
-import org.springframework.http.HttpMethod;
-import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
-import org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate;
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpDelete;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpGet;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpPost;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpClient;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.HttpClients;
+import org.apache.hc.core5.http.io.entity.StringEntity;
+import java.io.BufferedReader;
+import java.io.InputStreamReader;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
 import java.util.List;
 
-@Component
+@ApplicationScoped
 public class CartClient {
 
-    private final String baseUrl;
-
-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {
-        this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
-    }
-
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+    @ConfigProperty(name = "app.cart.url")
+    String baseUrl;
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        try (CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault()) {
+            HttpPost init = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" +
+                    encode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123");
+            client.execute(init).close();
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Infinite Jest"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Bel Canto"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Kafka on the Shore"))).close();
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            var response = client.execute(get);
+            List<String> books = new ArrayList<>();
+            try (var entity = response.getEntity();
+                 var in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(entity.getContent()))) {
+                String line;
+                while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
+                    books.add(line);
+                }
+            }
+            books.forEach(title -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            client.execute(new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + encode("Gravity's Rainbow"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear")).close();
+        }
     }
 
+    private String encode(String s) {
+        return s.replace(" ", "%20").replace("'", "%27");
+    }
 }

+++ b/agentic2/codex/business_domain/cart-spring-to-quarkus/run_1/CHANGELOG.md

+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:41:00Z] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
+- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:41:30Z] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
+- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:42:30Z] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
+- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:43:15Z] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
+- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
+- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
+- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
+- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
+- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:43:45Z] [info] Client cleanup and configs
+- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
+- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:44:10Z] [info] Build plugin configuration
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:44:24Z] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
+- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
+- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
+- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
+- Suggested Actions:
+  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
+  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
+  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).

 package spring.examples.tutorial.cart;
 
-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
-import org.springframework.core.ParameterizedTypeReference;
-import org.springframework.http.HttpMethod;
-import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
-import org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate;
+import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpDelete;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpGet;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpPost;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpClient;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.HttpClients;
+import org.apache.hc.core5.http.io.entity.StringEntity;
+import java.io.BufferedReader;
+import java.io.InputStreamReader;
+import java.util.ArrayList;
 import java.util.List;
 
-@Component
+@ApplicationScoped
 public class CartClient {
 
-    private final String baseUrl;
-
-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {
-        this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
-    }
-
-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+    @ConfigProperty(name = "app.cart.url")
+    String baseUrl;
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        try (CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault()) {
+            HttpPost init = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" +
+                    encode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123");
+            client.execute(init).close();
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Infinite Jest"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Bel Canto"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Kafka on the Shore"))).close();
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            var response = client.execute(get);
+            List<String> books = new ArrayList<>();
+            try (var entity = response.getEntity();
+                 var in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(entity.getContent()))) {
+                String line;
+                while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
+                    books.add(line);
+                }
+            }
+            books.forEach(title -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            client.execute(new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + encode("Gravity's Rainbow"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear")).close();
+        }
     }
 
+    private String encode(String s) {
+        return s.replace(" ", "%20").replace("'", "%27");
+    }
 }

+                    <extensions>true</extensions>

codex
**Migration Summary**

I migrated the multi-module Spring Boot application to Quarkus. This included replacing the Spring BOM and plugins with the Quarkus platform BOM and `quarkus-maven-plugin`, swapping Spring dependencies for Quarkus equivalents, and refactoring server-side code from Spring MVC to JAX-RS with CDI. The client module was converted from Spring Boot to a Quarkus CLI app using `@QuarkusMain`, with HTTP calls performed via Apache HttpClient 5 and configuration via MicroProfile Config. A build attempt failed due to restricted network access preventing Maven from resolving Quarkus artifacts; the error and mitigation steps are documented.

**File Tree (modified/added/removed files)**

- Modified
  - pom.xml: Switched Spring Boot BOM to Quarkus BOM; pluginManagement updated to `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
  - cart-common/pom.xml: Replaced `spring-context` with `quarkus-arc`.
  - cart-service/pom.xml: Replaced `spring-context` with `quarkus-arc`.
  - cart-app/pom.xml: Replaced `spring-boot-starter-web` with `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`; added `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartController.java: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS + CDI.
  - cart-service/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/service/CartServiceImpl.java: Spring annotations -> CDI `@Named @SessionScoped`; implements `Serializable`.
  - cart-appclient/pom.xml: Removed Spring Boot web starter; added `quarkus-arc`; added `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Spring Boot -> Quarkus `@QuarkusMain` CLI.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartClient.java: Spring RestTemplate -> Apache HttpClient; MicroProfile Config.
  - CHANGELOG.md: Added comprehensive migration log with timestamps and severities.
- Added
  - cart-app/src/main/resources/application.properties: Quarkus HTTP config.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/RestApplication.java: JAX-RS application class.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/resources/application.properties: Quarkus app config and `app.cart.url`.
- Removed
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/SessionAwareRestTemplate.java: Spring-specific client helper.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Spring Boot application class (replaced by JAX-RS `RestApplication`).

**Step-by-Step Log**

- [2025-11-27T00:41:00Z] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
  - Identified Spring Boot BOM, Spring web starter, Spring context, and Spring client usage.
- [2025-11-27T00:41:30Z] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
  - Switched to Quarkus platform BOM and `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
- [2025-11-27T00:42:30Z] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
  - Common/service: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`; app: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`; client: removed Spring starter.
- [2025-11-27T00:43:15Z] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
  - Controllers to JAX-RS; beans to CDI; client to Quarkus CLI.
- [2025-11-27T00:43:45Z] [info] Client cleanup and configs
  - Removed Spring helper; added Quarkus properties.
- [2025-11-27T00:44:10Z] [info] Build plugin configuration
  - Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to server and client modules.
- [2025-11-27T00:44:24Z] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
  - Maven cannot resolve Quarkus BOM; documented mitigations.

**CHANGELOG.md Contents**
```markdown
# Migration Changelog

## [2025-11-27T00:41:00Z] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.

## [2025-11-27T00:41:30Z] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.

## [2025-11-27T00:42:30Z] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.

## [2025-11-27T00:43:15Z] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.

## [2025-11-27T00:43:45Z] [info] Client cleanup and configs
- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.

## [2025-11-27T00:44:10Z] [info] Build plugin configuration
- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.

## [2025-11-27T00:44:24Z] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
- Suggested Actions:
  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).
```

**Error Handling**

- Non-resolvable import POM for `io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:3.13.2`
  - Impact: Blocks dependency resolution; build fails at root project.
  - Mitigation:
    - Enable network access during build or pre-fill `.m2repo` with required Quarkus artifacts.
    - Configure Maven to use an internal mirror accessible in this environment (`settings.xml` with `<mirrors>`).
    - As a last resort, vendor jars in-repo with `systemPath` (not recommended).

Would you like me to configure a local Maven settings file to point to an internal mirror, or attempt an offline build using vendored artifacts if you provide them?
file update:

+# Migration Changelog
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:41:00Z] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
+- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:41:30Z] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
+- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
+- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:42:30Z] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
+- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
+- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
+- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:43:15Z] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
+- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
+- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
+- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
+- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
+- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:43:45Z] [info] Client cleanup and configs
+- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
+- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:44:10Z] [info] Build plugin configuration
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
+- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.
+
+## [2025-11-27T00:44:24Z] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
+- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
+- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
+- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
+- Suggested Actions:
+  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
+  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
+  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).

-import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;

+import jakarta.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
+import jakarta.inject.Inject;
+import org.eclipse.microprofile.config.inject.ConfigProperty;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpDelete;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpGet;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.classic.methods.HttpPost;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.CloseableHttpClient;
+import org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.classic.HttpClients;
+import org.apache.hc.core5.http.io.entity.StringEntity;

+@ApplicationScoped
 public class CartClient {
 
-    private final String baseUrl;
-
-    public CartClient(@Value("${app.cart.url}") String baseUrl) {

-    }

-    public void doCartOperations() {
-        SessionAwareRestTemplate sessionTemplate = new SessionAwareRestTemplate();
-        RestTemplate restTemplate = sessionTemplate.getRestTemplate();
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/initialize?person={person}&id={id}", null,
-                Void.class, "Duke d'Url", "123");
-
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Infinite Jest");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class, "Bel Canto");
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/add?title={title}", null, Void.class,
-                "Kafka on the Shore");
+    @ConfigProperty(name = "app.cart.url")
+    String baseUrl;
 
-        List<String> books = restTemplate.exchange(
-                baseUrl + "/contents",
-                HttpMethod.GET,
-                null,
-                new ParameterizedTypeReference<List<String>>() {}).getBody();
+    public void doCartOperations() throws Exception {
+        try (CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault()) {
+            HttpPost init = new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/initialize?person=" +
+                    encode("Duke d'Url") + "&id=123");
+            client.execute(init).close();
 
-        books.forEach(title -> System.out
-                .println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Infinite Jest"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Bel Canto"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/add?title=" + encode("Kafka on the Shore"))).close();
 
-        System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
-        restTemplate.delete(baseUrl + "/remove?title={title}", "Gravity's Rainbow");
+            HttpGet get = new HttpGet(baseUrl + "/contents");
+            var response = client.execute(get);
+            List<String> books = new ArrayList<>();
+            try (var entity = response.getEntity();
+                 var in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(entity.getContent()))) {
+                String line;
+                while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
+                    books.add(line);
+                }
+            }
+            books.forEach(title -> System.out.println("Retrieving book title from cart: " + title));
 
-        restTemplate.postForEntity(baseUrl + "/clear", null, Void.class);
+            System.out.println("Removing \"Gravity's Rainbow\" from cart.");
+            client.execute(new HttpDelete(baseUrl + "/remove?title=" + encode("Gravity's Rainbow"))).close();
+            client.execute(new HttpPost(baseUrl + "/clear")).close();
+        }
     }
 
+    private String encode(String s) {
+        return s.replace(" ", "%20").replace("'", "%27");
+    }
 }

**Migration Summary**

I migrated the multi-module Spring Boot application to Quarkus. This included replacing the Spring BOM and plugins with the Quarkus platform BOM and `quarkus-maven-plugin`, swapping Spring dependencies for Quarkus equivalents, and refactoring server-side code from Spring MVC to JAX-RS with CDI. The client module was converted from Spring Boot to a Quarkus CLI app using `@QuarkusMain`, with HTTP calls performed via Apache HttpClient 5 and configuration via MicroProfile Config. A build attempt failed due to restricted network access preventing Maven from resolving Quarkus artifacts; the error and mitigation steps are documented.

**File Tree (modified/added/removed files)**

- Modified
  - pom.xml: Switched Spring Boot BOM to Quarkus BOM; pluginManagement updated to `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
  - cart-common/pom.xml: Replaced `spring-context` with `quarkus-arc`.
  - cart-service/pom.xml: Replaced `spring-context` with `quarkus-arc`.
  - cart-app/pom.xml: Replaced `spring-boot-starter-web` with `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`; added `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartController.java: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS + CDI.
  - cart-service/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/service/CartServiceImpl.java: Spring annotations -> CDI `@Named @SessionScoped`; implements `Serializable`.
  - cart-appclient/pom.xml: Removed Spring Boot web starter; added `quarkus-arc`; added `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Spring Boot -> Quarkus `@QuarkusMain` CLI.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/CartClient.java: Spring RestTemplate -> Apache HttpClient; MicroProfile Config.
  - CHANGELOG.md: Added comprehensive migration log with timestamps and severities.
- Added
  - cart-app/src/main/resources/application.properties: Quarkus HTTP config.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/RestApplication.java: JAX-RS application class.
  - cart-appclient/src/main/resources/application.properties: Quarkus app config and `app.cart.url`.
- Removed
  - cart-appclient/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/SessionAwareRestTemplate.java: Spring-specific client helper.
  - cart-app/src/main/java/spring/examples/tutorial/cart/Application.java: Spring Boot application class (replaced by JAX-RS `RestApplication`).

**Step-by-Step Log**

- [2025-11-27T00:41:00Z] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
  - Identified Spring Boot BOM, Spring web starter, Spring context, and Spring client usage.
- [2025-11-27T00:41:30Z] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
  - Switched to Quarkus platform BOM and `quarkus-maven-plugin`.
- [2025-11-27T00:42:30Z] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
  - Common/service: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`; app: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`; client: removed Spring starter.
- [2025-11-27T00:43:15Z] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
  - Controllers to JAX-RS; beans to CDI; client to Quarkus CLI.
- [2025-11-27T00:43:45Z] [info] Client cleanup and configs
  - Removed Spring helper; added Quarkus properties.
- [2025-11-27T00:44:10Z] [info] Build plugin configuration
  - Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to server and client modules.
- [2025-11-27T00:44:24Z] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
  - Maven cannot resolve Quarkus BOM; documented mitigations.

**CHANGELOG.md Contents**
```markdown
# Migration Changelog

## [2025-11-27T00:41:00Z] [info] Audit project and Spring usage
- Identified Spring Boot parent BOM, Spring web starter in `cart-app`, Spring context in `cart-common` and `cart-service`, and Spring client usage in `cart-appclient`.

## [2025-11-27T00:41:30Z] [info] Updated root BOM and plugins to Quarkus
- Replaced Spring Boot BOM with Quarkus BOM in `pom.xml`.
- Added `io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin` to pluginManagement.

## [2025-11-27T00:42:30Z] [info] Replaced Spring dependencies with Quarkus
- `cart-common`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
- `cart-service`: `spring-context` -> `quarkus-arc`.
- `cart-app`: `spring-boot-starter-web` -> `quarkus-resteasy`, `quarkus-resteasy-jackson`, `quarkus-undertow`.
- `cart-appclient`: removed Spring Web starter, added `quarkus-arc` + `httpclient5`.

## [2025-11-27T00:43:15Z] [info] Refactored code to Quarkus APIs
- `CartServiceImpl`: `@Service` + Spring session scope -> `@Named @SessionScoped` (CDI); implements `Serializable`.
- `CartController`: Spring MVC annotations -> JAX-RS (`@Path`, `@GET/@POST/@DELETE`, `@QueryParam`) with `@Inject` Cart.
- `Application` (server): switched to JAX-RS `Application` class.
- `Application` (client): switched to `@QuarkusMain` with `QuarkusApplication` run method.
- `CartClient`: replaced Spring `RestTemplate` with Apache HttpClient 5; injected `app.cart.url` via MicroProfile Config.

## [2025-11-27T00:43:45Z] [info] Client cleanup and configs
- Removed Spring `SessionAwareRestTemplate` helper; replaced with Apache HttpClient 5 usage.
- Added Quarkus `application.properties` in `cart-app` and `cart-appclient`.

## [2025-11-27T00:44:10Z] [info] Build plugin configuration
- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-app` module.
- Added `quarkus-maven-plugin` to `cart-appclient` module.

## [2025-11-27T00:44:24Z] [error] Compilation failed due to restricted network
- Command: `mvn -q -Dmaven.repo.local=.m2repo clean package`
- Details: Maven could not resolve Quarkus BOM and dependencies because external network access is restricted.
- Impact: Build cannot complete without downloading Quarkus platform BOM and dependencies.
- Suggested Actions:
  - Re-run build with network enabled or a pre-populated local repo (`.m2repo`) containing Quarkus artifacts.
  - Alternatively, set up an internal Maven proxy/repository mirror accessible in this environment.
  - If offline compilation is required, vendor required jars into the repo using `systemPath` scope (not recommended for long-term).
```

**Error Handling**

- Non-resolvable import POM for `io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:3.13.2`
  - Impact: Blocks dependency resolution; build fails at root project.
  - Mitigation:
    - Enable network access during build or pre-fill `.m2repo` with required Quarkus artifacts.
    - Configure Maven to use an internal mirror accessible in this environment (`settings.xml` with `<mirrors>`).
    - As a last resort, vendor jars in-repo with `systemPath` (not recommended).

Would you like me to configure a local Maven settings file to point to an internal mirror, or attempt an offline build using vendored artifacts if you provide them?
